summary: Iteration 42: All 8 bug fixes verified - Backend APIs and Frontend UI all working correctly
passed_tests: UI: Admin dashboard tabs visible and scrollable on mobile - PASSED
UI: ClientsPage loads with 158 clients - PASSED
UI: Client name click navigates to /process/{id} - PASSED
UI: Ver Ficha navigates to /process/{id} - PASSED
UI: MobileBottomNav Clientes button navigates to /meus-clientes for consultor - PASSED
UI: LeadsKanban shows 6 Kanban columns on desktop - PASSED
UI: LeadsKanban shows list view on mobile (4 items) - PASSED
UI: Mobile Kanban hidden, mobile list visible - PASSED

features_verified.evidence: Users can update their name and phone. Empty body returns 400. Unauthorized returns 401.
Password validation works (6+ chars required). Wrong current password returns 400. Success changes password.
Creates new process using process_id as client_id. New process #157 created for 'Ana Seidi'. Invalid ID returns 404.

features_verified.feature: Bug Fix 4: MobileBottomNav - Consultores go to /meus-clientes
features_verified.evidence: Consultor clicking 'Clientes' navigates to /meus-clientes. Page shows 'Os Meus Clientes' with 24 clients.

features_verified.feature: Bug Fix 5: AdminDashboard tabs scroll on mobile
features_verified.evidence: TabsList has inline-flex w-max min-w-full h-auto p-1 gap-1 classes. Tabs show abbreviated text on mobile (Cal, Doc, Users, IA).

features_verified.feature: Bug Fix 6: Ver Ficha navigates to /process/{id}
Bug Fix 7: Client name click navigates to /process/{id}
Bug Fix 8: LeadsKanban shows list on mobile, Kanban on desktop
features_verified.evidence: Desktop: 6 Kanban columns visible (hidden md:flex). Mobile: List view visible (md:hidden) with 4 lead items. mobileListVisible: true, kanbanVisible: false

critical_code_review_comments: auth.py: Profile update endpoint correctly validates allowed_fields ['name', 'phone']
auth.py: Change password validates 6+ character minimum
clients.py: create-process route handles both real client_id and process_id (virtual client)
MobileBottomNav.jsx: getClientsPath() correctly returns /meus-clientes for consultor, intermediario, mediador roles
AdminDashboard.js: TabsList has proper classes for horizontal scroll on mobile
LeadsKanban.js: Uses hidden md:flex for desktop Kanban, md:hidden for mobile list

admin.note: Password was changed from 'admin' to 'adminadmin' because validation requires 6+ chars

seed_data_creation: Created test processes during create-process tests (archived after test)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 bug fixes verified as WORKING. Admin password is now 'adminadmin' (6+ chars required by validation). Rate limits: 10 logins/minute. Test data: 158 clients, 196 processes, 4 leads in Kanban.
screenshots_captured: .screenshots/consultor_meus_clientes.png - Os Meus Clientes page for consultor
